mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_game_score (game_seq, user_seq, score, play_time) VALUES (#{gameSequence}, #{userSequence}, #{score}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT @rn:=@rn+1 AS rank, nickname, point FROM ( SELECT (SELECT nickname FROM tb_user WHERE seq = user_seq) AS nickname, MAX(score) AS point FROM tb_game_score WHERE game_seq = #{gameSequence} GROUP BY user_seq ORDER BY point DESC, nickname ASC ) t1, (SELECT @rn:=0) t2;
